metadata.title: Nunn Bush Men's Kore Tour Canvas Plain Toe Oxford Athletic Style Sneaker Lace Up
features: Made in the USA or Imported

Classic Style: The KORE Tour Canvas Plain Toe Oxford assures you a stylish look combined with superior comfort at a great price. Designed to be worn either dressed up or down with all your favorite pants and attire

Comfort: Our comfortable footbed is created with 20% BLOOM Algae, which will return 32 liters of clean water to habitats and clean 20 cubic meters of air and Smartscent Footbed Technology to provide superior cushioning, all-day support, and help eliminate unwanted odors

Perfect FIT: Pamper your feet with this amazing casual fashion athletic inspired sneaker that is constructed with premium canvas and materials to provide the highest level of fit integrity. Available in medium width and wide width for the perfect fit

Outsole: Our KORE Technology is biomechanically designed for comfort and walking. As it propels you forward, the sole is designed to support and cushion your every step. These shoes are made for walking in style
Value: Nunn Bush is highly regarded as a premier footwear brand by providing the best value and style in fine Men's footwear since 1912
description: Part sneaker, part oxford, the Nunn Bush KORE Tour Canvas Plain Toe Oxford is a hybrid casual shoe that is designed for work and weekend alike. No matter how you wear it, you will love the comfort of its breathable mesh linings and cushioned footbed.
